oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Postcard showing guard mount from Camp Sevier, South Carolina
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This black and white postcard shows a World War I guard mount from Camp Sevier, South Carolina. On the back, Musician Kenneth Redford, HQ Co., 114th FA, 30th Div., writes to his sister, Irma. He writes to adviser her that he is somewhere in Virginia. There are two partial stamps on the postcard.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
